The Riders for Health website will be back soon.

Riders for health was founded in 1989. Our Vision “Is a world in which healthcare reaches everyone, everywhere” and our mission is “To make the last mile the most important mile in health care delivery creating showing and sharing the solutions for achieving truly equitable health care”. This is to build strong technical programmes that enable health care to be delivered in rural Africa using totally reliable transport. Building on Riders’ success, the organisation is now more systematically based in Africa under the direction of the Riders Management Council. The Management Council consist of all country program leaders of Riders programs in Africa. In support of this change, the Management Council has created Riders International Secretariat to lead the organisation. The Executive Director of the Secretariat, based in the United Kingdom, is Ngwarati Mashonga ( nmashonga@ridersintl.org ).

This means we have the benefit of taking advantage of innovation and at the same time the benefit of using a tried and tested systems and processes. A combination of innovation and stability has been ingredients in the success of Riders for over 25 years.
